alert.note: Alert for De Soto (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 9:47PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN DE SOTO PARISH... PANOLA...CENTRAL RUSK AND NORTHERN SHELBY COUNTIES THROUGH 1030 PM CDT... At 947 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tatum to near Deberry. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Carthage, Logansport, Tatum, Tenaha, Beckville, Joaquin, Deberry, Pinehill, Minden, Gary City, Stanley, Chapman, Front, Monroe, Fairplay, Stewart, Midyett, Chalk Hill, Deadwood, and Dotson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
